name: Still Life 10.1 (glitch)
description: Fizz Pop (b.1974), Still Life 10.1 (glitch), 2010, 3245 x 2550 pixels  —  A glitch occurred while saving Still Life 10.1 causing the file to be flattened & a horizontal bar placed through the painting; beginning as red on the right, moving to blue on the left.  The info, for the Golden Age 'Flower in glass’ painting this still life was sourced from, was lost when the file was flattened.  I have always been fascinated by this glitch & would love to know how to reproduce it.
